ARABIC: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَٰبِ إِدْرِيسَ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقًا نَّبِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Mention Idris in the Book. He was a true man and a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Commemorate Enoch in the Book. He was a truthful person and a prophet,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And recite in the Book the account of Idris. He was a man of truth, a Prophet;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Mention in the Book (the Quran) the story of Idris (Enoch); he was a truthful Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And remember Idrees in the Book; he was indeed very truthful, a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And mention in the Book, Idris. Verily, he was a man of truth, (and) a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And mention Idris in the Book; surely he was a truthful man, a prophet,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And mention in the Book Idris; he was a true man, a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And make mention in the Scripture of Idris. Lo! he was a saint, a prophet;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Tell also of Idris in the Book. He was a man of truth and a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And mention thou in the book ldris, verily he was a man of truth, a prophet. *Chapter: 19
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And mention in the Book Idrees. Indeed, he was a truthful one and a prophet,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Also mention in the Book the case of Idris: He was a man of truth (and sincerity), (and) a prophet:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And mention in the Book (the Quran) Idris (Enoch). Verily! He was a man of truth, (and) a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And mention in the Book, Idris; he too was of the truth and a Prophet,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And mention in the Scripture Enoch. He was a man of truth, a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And mention in the Book, Idrees. Indeed, he was a man of truth and a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:56] And mention in the Book Idrīs, who was Noah’s great-grandfather. Indeed he was a truthful one, a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And make mention in the Scripture of Idris) of the event of Idris. (Lo! he was a saint) he believed in his faith, (a prophet) informing on behalf of Allah;
